product_name: REI MultiTowel XX Large Towel - 59" x 36"
long_description: The full-size XX Large REI MultiTowel offers excellent coverage and comfort when you're traveling or lounging on the beach. Waffle texture allows the towel to absorb up to 8 times its weight in water, yet wring out almost completely dry. Ultrasoft synthetic fabric is light and compact, taking up very little space in your backpack or bag. Quick-attach loop makes it easy to hang the towel to dry. The REI MultiTowel comes in a carry pouch.
short_description: The full-size XX Large REI MultiTowel offers excellent coverage and comfort when you're traveling or lounging on the beach.
